attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!
attributes.review: This app had my battery power go down so quickly and as soon as I put my information in it, it spammed my phone with so many emails about 🍤 campaign, please don’t get this app it is so bad!

attributes.title: Most terrible app out there
attributes.review: This app is so terrible it hacked my phone to the point that I can’t even vote for in the elections anymore for the person I actually want anymore. It’s obligating me to vote for trump (please take this app down!!!!!!!NOWWWW) 😭

attributes.title: TAKE THIS APP DOWN🤡
attributes.review: Can't believe my poor phone has to experience this orange. Don't get this app it will glitch your phone and you don't want that to happen right? So delete this app please, why is it on the app store.💖🤠

attributes.title: Embarrassing 😪🤚
attributes.review: Can’t believe this app exist, as soon i open it I just get bombarded with pictures if this Cheeto man 🙅‍♀️, I had to find out who this man was so i look him up turns out he’s the president of the United States 😦😳. Do not download 🤢🤚

attributes.title: This app is dog
attributes.review: I would rather give 69 the aux than have this app it’s so trash I gave my phone to my dog and she died because she seen him like that’s messed up like I need a new dog you have to buy me one because I’m not 😭

attributes.title: Full of security flaws
attributes.review: Downloaded the app to find out what land our Dear Leaders next beautiful, COVID “deep state” 19 free, God sanctioned rally would be blessed by. However, after I downloaded it I kept getting text messages from Russians offering to hijack a foreign election. SAD😭!

attributes.title: Horrible. Absolutely despicable app
attributes.review: This app laggs a lot, it’s slow, horrible colors overall not good. Trump is better off advertising his campaign on newspaper or better yet not advertising at all. This alp ruined my phone it’s a virus.

attributes.title: This app is of very poor quality
attributes.review: Does not navigate easily. Graphics are blurry. Glitches often and the only way I can fix it is to restart my phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Info is fake. Fascist.

attributes.title: Smelly
attributes.review:
I got this app and then all da sudden, my phone caught on fire. 🤭🤭🤭 I hoped father trump would help me put the fire 🔥 out🧯🧯!! but when i tried to use the app my entire house 🏠 blew up 💥 and killed my entire family😕.     
👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 = 💀💀💀 
i am homeless now...
❌ 🏠

attributes.title: Worst thing on apple store
attributes.review: I can’t even explain how awful this is. This is the worst thing since pineapples on pizza. This is the worst thing since Jim Crow. I do not want my child to have access to the disgraceful act of hatred produced by Donald trump. AND THATS ON PERIOD!
